name: John Stabler
text: Community theatre at its finest, definitely somewhere to spend a cute date night or experience a show you've been dying to see. Sometimes it's not polished but you definitely feel the passion from performances.

name: David H Jones
text: Great people and great shows! Wonderful space with a great atmosphere. The shows are challenging and moving and defines what a true community theatre should be. Their large scale musicals at the Bama Theatre are top notch and frankly awesome.

name: Dark Mandalorian
text: They do good shows for a good cause. Go and see Urinetown this week if you haven't.

name: Steven Gardner
text: Fantastic new space for performing Arts to practice and perform. There are bars in the lobby area, too. Good experience, and nearby the railroad park night life. highly recommend attending an event!

name: Belinda Peoples
text: So, So, Beautiful. I am Proud To Be A Part Of the Red Mountain Theater Company. What A Blessing And Treasure For The Birmingham Community, And The State Of Alabama.😁 You Must Go And Visit To See What I See. A State Of The Arts!!! 💕💕💕🌞

name: Kristi Griffin
text: Can't wait for new shows to come out! Beautiful new building and the cast is spectacular!

resp.text: Thanks for the five star review!
